install.name: Joomfish - Basic Router
install.author: Joom!Fish Project
install.description: When activated this bot provides language determination and basic routing. Must be enabled unless you are using a SEF plugin that performs the same tasks.

field.name: determitLanguage
field.label: ENABLE_LANGUAGE_DETERMINATION
field.description: If an unkown user comes to your site - try to determinate the language based on the browser settings.

field.name: newVisitorAction
field.label: Language selection for new visitors?
field.description: Determine language selection for new visitors (only Enable Language determination is 'Yes')
field.option: Ordering of Languages in Joomfish Component

field.name: use302redirect
field.label: Use 302 redirect
field.description: For new users the redirection to the correct language is done by automatic integration or an official 302 redirect to a different URL such as www.yourdomain.com/en

field.name: enableCookie
field.description: Switch off the cookie only if you have a different solution to define the once selected language, e.g. via an URL.
field.label: SAVE_USER_LANGUAGE_IN_A_COOKIE
